content:
hello team,
can anyone help me figure out this: what's the procedure to deploy https://rust-lang.github.io/compiler-team after a PR is merged? Is it automatic or someone must push a button?
thanks :)

my recollection is that it used to be automatic, and looking at gh-pages (if that's still how this is hosted) https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/tree/gh-pages makes it look it possibly hasn't been deployed for a while
travis.org shut down a long while ago. Most projects have switched over to GitHub Actions to do automatic deploy.
ah right, we havenâ€™t updated this repo to use GHA yet

Opened a PR: https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/pull/486
(if anyone has a minute to spare for that - it's not urgent)
Xuanwo has marked this topic as resolved.
Xuanwo has marked this topic as unresolved.
Sorry for marking as resolved by mistake.
